name: Proteus (itch)
description:
Proteus is an ambient musical exploration game where your exploration of a changing island creates an abstract-immersive soundtrack to your wandering.

Created by Ed Key (development+design) and David Kanaga (music+design). Additional development by Alex May, Jon Brodsky and Ethan Lee.

The physical Artifact Edition is available to purchase on our Big Cartel page.

The soundtrack - "Proteus Suites" - is available to stream or purchase on David's Bandcamp page
